coding_practice.title: Add Digits
coding_practice.description: Given an integer num, repeatedly add all its digits until the result has only one digit, and return it.

examples.explanation:
The process is
38 --> 3 + 8 --> 11
11 --> 1 + 1 --> 2
Since 2 has only one digit, return it.

coding_practice.follow up: Could you do it without any loop/recursion in O(1) runtime?
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 當 num 大於等於 10 時，將 num 轉成字串，逐位拆解相加。
2. 重複步驟 1，直到 num 只剩一位數。
3. 回傳最終的 num。
